Package server

Class ServerConnSQL

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.ServerConnSQL
  • public class ServerConnSQL
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class ServerConnSQL is responsible for the connection to the sql server and is used as the main driver for different data request and data storage protocol commands.

                            java.sql.Date reportDate)

        Parameters:
        t - the report type

        branch - the branch that the report was made on
        reportDate - the report date (if quarterly then the month part is the quarter)
        Returns:
        true, if exists
